text: Cells were treated as described for Western blots .
Total RNA was isolated using ZR Miniprep kit ( Zymo Research ) .
1 microg of RNA was converted to cDNA using random primers ( M-MuLV cDNA kit , New England Biolabs ) .
1 microL of cDNA was used with 500 pM primers in qPCR reactions .
Reactions were performs using SYBRGreen 2xMaster mix ( SABiosciences ) in a LightCycler480 ( Roche ) .
